data.name: Lyratha: Labyrinth - Survival - Escape
data.detailed_description:
Story:
Far away from the fate of the world and time, deep in catacombs and vaults of long-forgotten places, the Lyratha Order
conceals his existence, without knowledge of humanity outside.

In their dignified halls, they train their skills to perfection. The conjure portals, which lead the way into the labyrinths of the refuges, test the skills of the candidates in every possible way.

Be careful when exploring!
Obstacles are guaranteed and your senses play pranks also. What is below will be above and gravity must obey you.
Fortunately, this is one of your easiest exercises.
Try to keep the overview.

Gameplay:
In this game, you control a young magician of the Lyratha Order. They conjure portals which leads into ever new labyrinths to enable its members to train their abilities.
It is your job to summon these mazes and, if possible, complete them. You will gain experience, rise in rank and, of course, improve your skills.
Find the key stones to increase your spell power and cast stronger.
Pay attention to the opponents who do more than harm. Some will teleport you to other places. Others carry you to the ceiling as the world revolves around you.
But most just want to get you out of the maze. If you choose more enemies, your reward will be more lucrative.

The magic:
The magic system is based on 5 powers that you have to master. Ignis (fire), Aura (air), Aqua (water), Spirit, Terra (earth) in each type, there are 2 spells that can still be skilled. Only 2 of them are pure attack spells, the rest goes from healing, enemy-sleep, to spurting to make your life easier.

Playing style:
Roleplaygame, puzzle game

data.short_description: Far away from the fate of the world and time, deep in catacombs and vaults of long-forgotten places, the Lyratha Order conceals his existence, without knowledge of humanity outside.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
